item.title: Notes on using xen in debian lenny
item.description: Make a xen image config xen-create-image --hostname=drclaw.toon-net.local --ip=192.168.2.15 --accounts --memory=512mb --size=8gb --role=udev NOTE: #hostname the machines name #ip the ip address of the machine #memory how much RAM you wish to allocate it #size disk space of image #role=udev setups udev on the image you might find you have issues with ssh and console on the image otherwise #accounts = import non system –accounts into image from master server Starting the image xm create /etc/xen/drclaw.
